snippet.title: Crewin May 2022 Showcase
snippet.description:
Showcase of what has been added since the games start on 11-2021

♥ Look at my game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1500370/Crewin_The_Wrath_Of_Athys/

♥ Don't forget you can help support the channel on Patreon! https://www.patreon.com/GamingTechnologies

Gaming Technologies // Media
● Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/gaming_technologies/
●Twitter Page - http://www.twitter.com/gamingtechnolo4

CH:
0:00: Settings
0:27:Advanced Souls Combat System
1:25: Dodge Rolling
1:39:Shopping/Inventory/Equipment
3:30:Quick Use Slots
